content: in this legal case the court issued a final resolution stating that one party is responsible for covering the procedural costs the court also ruled on the division of assets between the parties involved the defendant will have sole ownership of a garage and the furnishings appliances and electronics in the apartment they will also receive compensation from the common property the court allows for the right to appeal the decision within 30 days the claim made by one party is the basis for the dissolution of the marriage the court must determine the value of the joint assets and divide them accordingly the court also considers the loan obligations and payments made by the parties the court determines that the procedural costs should be borne by the parties involved

metadata.cost: Each party covers own procedural costs, unspecified amounts
